page.title: 16THE VILLAGE OF BILTON
page.content: In Bilton there are mostly bungalows and Houses. They are mostly semi detached ones. There are three green houses in the Garden Centre.In Bilton there is a garage which serves petrol and carries out repairs. Bilton is situated on the main road to Hull and Withernsea.There is a Fish and Chip shop which also sells crisps, sweets and drinks. There is also a newsagents called Jeans which sells Papers,Comics,Magazines,Sweets,Cards and a assortment of other things. Most people in Bilton have a car,a television,a video,a garage,double glazing and a Freezer. We found this out by doing interviews at the Post Office.
